alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:17PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN CUSTER AND SOUTH CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM MDT... At 917 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thompson Butte, or 13 miles southeast of Rapid City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Thompson Butte around 920 PM MDT. Railroad Buttes around 935 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City
